Source.Name: perl-devel-stacktrace
Source.Summary: An object representing a stack trace
Source.Description: The Devel-StackTrace module contains two classes, C,Devel-StackTrace> and Devel-StackTrace-Frame. These objects encapsulate the information that can retrieved via Perl's caller() function, as well as providing a simple interface to this data.

Package.Name: perl-devel-stacktrace
